trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Massillon
There were no other sightings in Massillon on or around May 19th 2013
Summary: This appeared to be a glowing red/orange orb.
divs: sighting detailsi was just dropping off my sister and 2 nephews at their home at about 11:50 pm and was driving down the street when i noticed a red\orange orb floating maybe a hundred feet off the ground or so heading north. i spotted the object immediately after looking at the moon. i could only describe the object as a glowing ball although i must concede that it may be a chinese lantern or some other explainable phenomenon. i began feeling a little nervous and excited, but decided to follow the object after it left my field of view. the entire event lasted for less than 2 minutes but i managed to capture some video.
